name: Turkey Defence
description: Evil turkeys are trying to Destroy thanksgiving!!!  use your mouse to recruit friends to get rid of those pesky Turkeys. once you recruit someone there image will appear next to the recruit menu for you to drag and drop. Indians throw spears at the turkeys, dealing damage to them, while pilgrims throw cranberry sauce at the turkeys, slowing them.  click on the recruitments to upgrade them (P:S upgrading your recruitments will upgrade all of them, not just 1 of them). the game ends when  5 small turkeys reach the pilgrim in the bottom corner . P:S this game is not good
